song.eTitle: Jesus, I My Cross Have Taken

verses.verse: Let the world despise and leave me- They have left my Savior, too; Human hearts and looks deceive me- Thou art faithful, Thou art true. O, 'tis not in grief to harm me, While Thy love is left to me; O, 'twere not in joy to charm me, If that love be hid from me.
